data.subtitle:
Happy with us? It shows. Your friends see it too. Share your feeling with them by sharing your code.
When they become part of Circles.Life, all of you will get 3-mo Unlimited Data. And you get 12-mo if it’s your first referral ever.

referral_share.referral_message:
Noticed I’ve been less stressed about my telco lately?? It’s because I’ve been with Circles.Life and they are just the b-e-s-t. Super hassle-free service (no contracts, v flexible plans, A+ customer support) and lots of added perks: like 3 months Unlimited Data (worth $60!) for free when you sign up. Use my code KOIHIRWU to get a plan and thank me next time we hang🤗
 https://qsg-webfrontek.circles.life/activate/sa_delivery?reset=1&code=KOIHIRWU&utm_source=organic&utm_medium=app&utm_campaign=referral
